## Just looking at a table

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggthemes)
library(readxl)
library(reshape2)
library(knitr)
library(ggrepel)


disco_hw <- read_xlsx("table_mean_diffs.xlsx")


```

```{r}


disco_hw

glimpse(disco_hw)



```

```{r}



ggplot(disco_hw, mapping = aes(Heart_Rate_Group, Discontinuity_Score,fill= Heart_Rate_Group))+
  
  geom_point(color="red", shape=22, size=7)+
  labs(
    xlab="Trichotomized Heart Rate Groups",
    ylab="Mean Discontinuity Score",
    title = "Mean Discontinuity Score for Three Heart Rate Groups")+
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-1, 1),
                     breaks = seq(-0.5, 1, by=0.1))+
    #lims(y= c(-1,1))+
    #scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 15)+
  theme_solarized()+
 geom_label(
    label="Highest 25% Heart Rates", 
    x="high",
    y=0.5,
    label.padding = unit(0.1, "lines"), # Rectangle size around label
    label.size = 0.1,
    color = "black",
    fill="pink"
  )+
   geom_label(
    label="Middle 50% Heart Rates", 
    x="middle",
    y=0.2,
    label.padding = unit(0.2, "lines"), # Rectangle size around label
    label.size = 0.1,
    color = "black",
    fill="pink"
  )+
   geom_label(
    label="Lowest 25% Heart Rates", 
    x="low",
    y=-0.2,
    label.padding = unit(0.2, "lines"), # Rectangle size around label
    label.size = 0.1,
    color = "black",
    fill="pink"
  )

```
